Battleship

Battleship (also known as Battleships or Sea Battle) is a strategy type guessing game for two players. It is played on ruled grids (paper or board) on which each player's fleet of warships are marked. The locations of the fleets are concealed from the other player. Players alternate turns calling "shots" at the other player's ships, and the objective of the game is to destroy the opposing player's fleet. More Info


Instructions


First place your ships. Then take turns taking shots at the enemy. If your shot misses you will see a white peg. If you hit your opponents ship, you see a red peg and you get to go again.

Place Your Ships

Press Spacebar to toggle orientation.
